name: @ziadkh0/flow-comments
description: A simple CLI that wraps/unwraps flow type annotations in comments

scripts.test: (npm run test:wrap && npm run test:unwrap && npm run test:remove && npm run test:files) || (npm run finallytest; false)
scripts.test:remove: ./bin/flow-comments remove < fixtures/wrapped.js | diff fixtures/wrapped-removed.js - > /dev/null && ./bin/flow-comments remove < fixtures/unwrapped.js | diff fixtures/unwrapped-removed.js - > /dev/null
scripts.test:files: cp fixtures/wrapped.js fixtures/temp_1.js && cp fixtures/wrapped.js fixtures/temp_2.js && ./bin/flow-comments unwrap 'fixtures/temp_*.js' && diff --to-file=fixtures/unwrapped.js fixtures/temp_*.js > /dev/null

author: Ziad EL KHOURY HANNA
